copy.defaulSpecialMsg: Fly into Pixie Hollow and enjoy!
copy.faqText: Learn more about how to find Secret Codes on our FAQs page.
copy.noaccount: Don't have an account yet? Click here to create an account and make a Fairy or Sparrow Man.
copy.specialMsgPrefixPlural: did not receive this item because their inventory is full.
copy.specialMsgPrefixSingular: did not receive this item because her inventory is full.
copy.specialMsg: You need to donate some items in the Leaf Journal before receiving this item. Please return to re-enter your secret code once you have made your donation.
copy.inventoryFull: Your inventory is currently full. You need to donate some items before you can redeem your Secret Code. Please return to redeem your Secret Code once you have made a donation.
copy.sorryPageBody: All of your Fairies have already received this item! Please try again with a different code.
copy.generalRedeemError: There was a problem using this code. Please check that the code is correct and that you have a Fairy or Sparrow Man in your account.
copy.tooManyOfItem: You have too many of that item.
copy.needAFairy: You need a Fairy or Sparrow Man in order to redeem your secret code. Please return here once you're done creating one!
copy.invalidlogin: THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH YOUR LOGIN, PLEASE TRY AGAIN
copy.whoamiError: There was an error retrieving your user information
